songs.title: Lela
songs.lyrics:
Dil deewana sacha pyaar tu pehla
Majnu mai tu meri lela...
Pehlan teri khushi fer dunia da mela
Majnu mai tu meri lela...

Sache dil di aas sada sajna da pyar
Jis din tu ni dise sade dil e barsat
Samjhe na bole meri boli meri meet
Tere liye likha main sunava tenu geet
Desi an di reet rag rag ch pyaar
Jivae Tere piche sat samundro paar
Shuru hoi eh kahani
Mai raja tu rani
Mili tu jivae mili menu navi zindagani...

Dil deewana sacha pyaar tu pehla
Majnu mai tu meri lela...
Pehlan teri khushi fer dunia da mela
Majnu mai tu meri lela...

Asi sunya c desi an di zindigi pardes ch aasan
Meri court ch peshiyan tu kare pareshan
Likhe meri saza mera rang dekh judge
Bhugtan sajavan mai kanoona to phaj
Pyaar ki cheez teri aakhan ch jawab
Dine dekha tenu raati tere dekh da main khwaab
Teri sari aadava da main rakhda hisab
Teri gallan naal bhari mere dil di kitab
Unch ya neech ameeri ya garebi
Tera pyaar ni badle meri khush nasibi
Akha band kar sine utte sir rakh mere
Lele khushiyan menu dede gum sare tere...

Dil deewana sacha pyaar tu pehla
Majnu mai tu meri lela...
Pehlan teri khushi fer dunia da mela
Majnu mai tu meri lela...
